mapper.insert: insert into trip(tripdate, writer, title, content) values(#{tripdate}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from trip order by tno desc
select * from trip where tno in ( (select tno from trip where tno < #{tno} order by tno desc limit 1), (select tno from trip where tno > #{tno} limit 1) ) order by tno desc
